events.Fire Temple Child FW Access:
can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                (at('Deku Tree Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Dodongos Cavern Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Forest Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Water Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Spirit Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Shadow Temple Entryway', is_child) or
                at('Bottom of the Well', is_child) or
                at('Ice Cavern Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Gerudo Training Grounds Lobby', is_child))
events.Fire Temple Child No Fairy: has_hearts(2) or 'Fire Temple Child FW Access'
events.Fire Temple Adult No Fairy:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or has_hearts(5) or 'Fire Temple Adult FW Access' or
                at('DMC From Warp Pad 2 Hearts', is_adult) or
                ((Hover_Boots or Hookshot) and at('DMC From Goron City 3 Hearts', is_adult))

locations.Fire Temple Near Boss Chest:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))
locations.Fairy Pot:
has_bottle and (Goron_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and (Goron_Tunic or has_hearts(2))) or
                (can_use(Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or
                    (three_heart_heat))))

exits.Fire Temple Boss Room:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and (Goron_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                ((logic_fire_boss_door_jump and (Goron_Tunic or
                    (unknown_heart_heat))) or
                (Hover_Boots and (Goron_Tunic or
                    (unknown_heart_heat))) or
                (at('Fire Temple Upper', can_play(Song_of_Time) or has_explosives) and
                (Goron_Tunic or
                    (unknown_heart_heat))))

events.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door:
is_adult and (Goron_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                ((Bombs and (Goron_Tunic or
                    (three_heart_heat))) or
                (has_bombchus and(Goron_Tunic or
                    (three_heart_heat))))

locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Doo:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))
locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door C:
is_adult and 'Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door' and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                    (three_heart_heat)))
locations.Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room:
is_adult and (Goron_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                ((can_play(Song_of_Time) and (Goron_Tunic or
                    (three_heart_heat))) or
                (logic_fire_song_of_time and (Goron_Tunic or
                    (three_heart_heat))))

exits.Fire Temple Middle:
is_adult and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4) and (Goron_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                (((has_explosives or Bow) and
                    ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (Goron_Tunic or
                        (unknown_heart_heat))) or
                    (logic_fire_strength and (Goron_Tunic or
                        (unknown_heart_heat))))) or
                (Progressive_Hookshot and
                    ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (Goron_Tunic or
                        (unknown_heart_heat))) or
                    (logic_fire_strength and (Goron_Tunic or
                        (unknown_heart_heat))))))

exits.Fire Temple Upper:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or 
                ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 7) and
                    ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer)) or logic_fire_flame_maze))

locations.Fire Temple Highest Goron Chest:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and 
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) or (logic_rusted_switches and 
                    (can_use(Hover_Boots) or has_explosives)))
